Articles.Content:
A plastic ball...

The last vegetable you touched is now an ice cream flavor.

Flying sneakers? YES!

The object directly next to your left elbow is your next spouse.

The air! YUS

The color of your ceiling is now the color of your skin.

This is kinda awkward... It's not too different...

You have 100 boxes/bags of the snack you last ate shipped to your house.

YES, ice cream for days!

The non-electronic object you last touched is now edible.

A toothbrush, yum

The last expensive thing you tiuched will disappear

My computer! Noooo

Your head becomes the shape of the last food you ate.

I knew I shouldn't have eaten those 10 tortilla chips right before going to bed.

The object you are currently looking at is now a nuclear reactor three seconds from meltdown.

Ah, such bai-AAAAAAAA

The object above you is now detached from every other surrounding object.

Why is there a hole in the ceiling above me?

The object to your right is now to your left.

It's about time that you brought me my water bottle.

The object behind you is the object that you will use to preform surgery on yourself.

A wooden door? hmm i guess it could work...

the last object you ate is now your computer screen

A cheese sandwich. Well, I guess it is quite a flat surface.

The object closest to your right elbow will be stuck to your left knee for the rest of your life.

I ain't strong enough to carry my desk for the rest of my life.

The last non-food thing you ate will now be covering your left eye for the rest of your life.

Eh, I don't mind hair over my eye. *insert emoticon here*

The nearest object to left hand (excluding your desk) has now teleported directly above your head.

oly crap were's te "" key?

The storage space in your inbox is Ã¢â‚¬â€¹full

No. I empitied it of 100 outdated messages.

he object to your right is your phone.

Well if I tilt my head like this then yes!

The thing below you is now 100 feet further down with you still being at the same height.

My cat sleeping under my chair? NOO!

The object right above you is now as heavy as an anvil.

So that means the roof caved in on me

the object behind you is now your computer

My refrigerator.

I now have...

A cool computer.

The first object you see after closing your eyes, spinning around once, and opening your eyes again is now what you cuddle with when you go to sleep.

Once again, my cat.

The object to your right is now to your left.

So... There is now air to my left now? YAY SUPER USEFUL!!!!

The object in your head is now on the other side of the planet.

My imagination can go anywhere it wants. Sometimes to uncomfortable places. But, anywhere.

The object moving right behind you is about to murder you!

Killed by a progress bar!

The object to your northwest is now moving at Mach 2.
